name: Flick Basketball Legend
description:
The most realistic basketball experience!

Let's pile Flick Basketball Legend! In this basketball game you need to throw the basketball quickly to score as many points as possible

Flick Basketball Legend is a simple but quite addictive basketball shooting game.
You have a limited number of basketballs, your goal is to shoot them for a better score. Beat everyone and become the king of the basketball.


How to play:

-Drag finger to aim basketball and make a basketball shot
-Release finger to take a basketball shot at basketball hoop

Enjoy making basketball games in this fun basketball game!
